Name: BACK and BACK to Hell
About the game: The infernal monsters got tired of sitting in the depths of hell and decided to break free! However, there was a hero who could prevent this treacherous invasion of the Earth, which represents only death and chaos. Meet the brave warrior who bravely landed behind enemy lines and smashes hordes of devils in a matter of minutes, turning their insidious plans for our planet to dust! BACK and BACK to Hell is a Top Down shooter in which you will have to fight waves of demons that endlessly make their raids on the main character, hoping to finish an absolutely crushing preemptive strike on their ranks. A simple and clear pumping, a variety of weapons, as well as a tooth-crushing mixture of slasher and shooter genres are presented to your choice! Go ahead, arrange a real HELL for the devils from hell! Features of the game: - Complexity - A rich selection of weapons - Leveling tree - Nice soundtrack
